chat.choose_new_set_name: Choose a new name for your set (or send /cancel to abort):
chat.set_renamed_error: Failed to rename the set to {new_name}
chat.time_warning: This might take a while, please be patient
chat.language_changed: Now i speak a new language
chat.confirm_delete_set: Are you sure you want to delete {set_title}? This action can't be undone
chat.choose_new_sticker_emoji: Choose a new emoji for this sticker (or send /cancel to abort):
chat.confirm_delete_sticker: Are you sure you want to delete this sticker?
chat.emoji_invalid: Invalid emoji, try again (or send /cancel to abort)
chat.emoji_change_error: Failed to change emoji, try again later
chat.sticker_deleted_error: Failed to delete sticker, try again later
chat.sticker_moved_error: Failed to move sticker, try again later
chat.choose_set_move: Choose a set to move the sticker to:

commands.my_sets: Here are your sets, choose one to do something:

errors.unsupported_update: Sorry, i can't process whatever this is
errors.no_sets: You don't have any sticker sets yet, send me a sticker to start
errors.group_chat: Sorry, I like privacy, send me a dm
errors.unknown_document_type: Sorry, I can't process this document type yet
errors.file_too_big: Sorry, this file is too big (max 20 MB)
errors.not_subscribed: You don't have an active PROscription. Run /subscription to buy one.

bot.description: This is the text seen before the bot is started
bot.about: This is the "about" in bot's profile

subscription.invoice_description: PROscribe to get access to all the features
subscription.subscription_not_active: You don't have an active PROscription. Press the button below to buy one.
subscription.subscription_status: Your PROscription is active until {date}. Press the button below to buy additional 365 days.
subscription.payment_success: Thank you for your purchase! Your PROscription is active until {date}.
subscription.deny_precheckout: I don't know how you got here, but you can't buy this
subscription.renewal_reminder: Your PROscription ends in {days_left} days. Run /subscription to renew it.
